instruction: In a bowl, combine yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, red chili powder, coriander powder, garam masala, lemon juice, and salt. Mix well to form a marinade.
title: Prepare Marinade

transcript_segments.text: Biryani is a constant battle over whose biryani is the best. And not just that—how it's made too. In fact, every state, every community has its own version of biryani. So the one that's made at your home might not be the same as the one made at mine.

But biryani is one such dish that, whenever it's made, fills the whole house with fragrance. And if you make a little extra, even the neighborhood will smell it. Today we are going to make Hyderabadi cooked meat (pakke gosht) biryani. We'll take the meat—

Now the rice will go in. I think a good measurement is to use the same weight of rice as meat. While the rice is blanching, we roll out this dough. This will be used for sealing the pot, the "dum" method.

instruction: Turn off the heat and let the biryani sit for 10 minutes to settle and absorb flavors.
title: Rest the Biryani

transcript_segments.text: Once again on high flame, for about one to one-and-a-half minutes so it starts cooking again. Then reduce the flame. Biryani is ready. Turn it off and let it rest for 10 minutes, without opening the lid. After that, we’ll open it.
Even opening biryani is an art. Use a spoon with a thin edge, or a plate—rotate it from one edge to fluff it gently. Then scoop and serve. If you just shove a spoon in, the layers will break.

instruction: Gently fluff the rice with a flat spoon without breaking the grains. Serve hot with raita, salad, or mirchi ka salan.
title: Serve

transcript_segments.text: Look at that—every grain is separate. Beautiful! First, we’ll serve the spiced rice from the bottom with the meat, and then the saffron rice from the top.
And a sign of a good biryani—obviously—the rice shouldn’t be lumpy, shouldn't be undercooked. Each grain should be separate. That’s the hallmark of a great biryani, again and again.
And our Hyderabadi meat biryani is ready.
